Package org.waarp.ftp.core.data.handler.ftps

This module is for FTPS support as native SSL/TLS on port 989 similar to RFC 2818.

Package org.waarp.ftp.core.data.handler.ftps Description

This module is for FTPS support as native SSL/TLS on port 989 similar to RFC 2818.
